channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Hi,i fixed everything so my client runs but when i try to log in Its saying : error connecting to server. I looked in client.java for ip adress,and normally i think i changed them all and compiled but its still giving the same error.
Can anyone help pls?

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @death_wish1234 death wish1234
item.description:
@death_wish1234 wrote:

Is your server running on port 43594? Some people run their servers on port 5555 or 55555 I can’t quite remember which one, it should be in client.java server-sided depending on what base you’re using

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

like above check the local ip and also the server port and client port match or your client cmd will say error when trying to log in most common port is “43594”

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Are you hosting this locally or through a vps?

Locally:
-> server ip: 127.0.0.1
-> check the port it’s using and make sure you have correctly allowed this port through your router

VPS:
-> server ip: VPS_IP
-> make sure the client’s port is allowed through the vps’ firewall, most windows VPS have windows firewall by default, you need to manually allow the port

Read full topic
